author: Chris Moore
description: Deliciously creamy pineapple and coconut enlivened by champagne with rum notes shining through.
name: Champagne Piña Colada
recipeIngredient: 25 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine
45 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND first 6 ingredients with 4oz scoop of crushed ice (including 15ml/ ½oz champagne) and pour into chilled glass which has been pre-charged with 45ml/ 1½oz of chilled champagne

video.description: Deliciously creamy pineapple and coconut enlivened by champagne with rum notes shining through.
video.name: HOWTO make Champagne Piña Colada
